title: EYA 1: You're More Successful Than You Think
description:
Navigating unmet expectations and disappointments can be difficult, especially when the world constantly shows us what success “should” look like and tells us that if we just do all the right things, everything will work out.

Whether the unmet expectations you face are huge disruptions or smaller things that worry or frustrate you, it can be easy to feel like you’ve failed or that you aren’t doing enough in your life.

As the first episode in a series that goes along with her new book, Embrace Your Almost, Jordan dives deeper into the topic of Chapter 1: how to redefine what a successful life looks like.

With new content not found in the book and reflection questions to ask yourself, this episode will help you rethink how you define success and how to cultivate a life you like before you get to where you want to be.

Tune in to learn:

  • What success really means
  • How society portrays a successful woman
  • What the Bible has to say about the desires of our heart
  • Reflection questions to help you redefine your idea of success
  • What to do when you feel like you've failed

Want to dig deeper?

Get a copy of Embrace Your Almost: https://jordanleedooley.com/eya

Download the free book guide: https://jlmedia.lpages.co/eya-book-study-guide/ 

Start the Bible study plan: https://www.bible.com/reading-plans/30872
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
